cta.title: Ready to Start Your Forging Project?
cta.subtitle: Our expert team is prepared to transform your design into high-quality forged components with precision and efficiency.

items.answer: We accommodate both small prototype runs and large-scale production orders, with flexible minimum order quantities tailored to your specific requirements.
items.question: What are your minimum order quantities?

items.answer: Standard lead times range from 2-6 weeks depending on component complexity and order volume. Rush orders are available for urgent projects.
items.question: What are your typical production lead times?

items.answer: We are Six Sigma certified and maintain rigorous quality control processes to ensure consistent, high-precision forged components.
items.question: What quality certifications do you maintain?

aboutusintro.title: About ABC Brass
aboutusintro.subtitle: Precision Manufacturing Since 1998
aboutusintro.description: Founded in 1998, ABC Brass has established itself as a leading precision forging manufacturer specializing in custom metal components. Our expansive 30,000 sq ft facility houses advanced manufacturing technologies, enabling us to deliver high-quality forged parts across diverse industrial sectors.

items.name: Michael Rodriguez
items.content: ABC Brass consistently delivers exceptional quality and precision. Their technical expertise and commitment to excellence make them our preferred forging partner.

items.name: Sarah Thompson
items.content: The team at ABC Brass understands our complex manufacturing requirements and delivers components that exceed our stringent quality standards.
